title: Exquisite Kundan & Coral 'Chand Bali' Style Jhumka with South Sea Pearls
features: This stunning jhumka showcases the traditional Kundan setting technique, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The 'Chand Bali' style crescent moon design is adorned with uncut diamonds (polki). Features a lotus (padmam) motif, creating a blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. Strands of lustrous South Sea pearls and vibrant coral add a touch of elegance and vibrancy. The design incorporates a delicate floral design made with rubies on the top along with the Kundan setting on the body of the earring with the pearl and coral hangings
occasions: and grand celebrations. Perfect for a Seemantham (baby shower) or any occasion where you want to make a statement.
description: A timeless piece that blends tradition with modern design. Handcrafted with meticulous detail, showcasing the artistry of Hyderabadi jewelry making. The use of high-quality materials like South Sea pearls and genuine coral adds value and sophistication. The 'Chand Bali' style makes it a versatile piece that can be worn with both traditional and contemporary outfits. The combination of coral and pearls is considered auspicious in South Indian culture, representing prosperity and good fortune.
